definitions.definition: Something installed, especially the whole of a system of machines , apparatus , and accessories , when set up and arranged for practical working , as in electric lighting , transmission of power , etc.
A grouping of facilities that constitute a permanent military base .

secondary_definitions: Something installed, especially the whole of a system of machines , apparatus , and accessories , when set up and arranged for practical working , as in electric lighting , transmission of power , etc.
A grouping of facilities that constitute a permanent military base .
